articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Combat Flight Contest among Commanding Officers of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Combat Flight Contest among Commanding Officers of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) - Supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, guided the combat flight contest among commanding officers of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force-2016.
					 He came out to the airfield with Ri Sol Ju on 9 a.m.
					
					 Pilots of fighters of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force presented bouquets to him.
					
					 The commander of the force made an inaugural address.
					
					 Kim Jong Un issued an order of sortie to the commanding officers and pilots who lined up before the observation deck on the platform.
					
					 The contest was divided into the group of pursuit aircraft and that of light aircraft. 
					
					 Each pair of a flying regiment took off and flew close to the target area before bombing and strafing the circled target and landing by order.  The standings of groups and units were decided according to the points assessed with the help of various type observation apparatuses.
					
					They flew like lightening and succeeded in blowing up all the targets. Watching the hot contest among the commanding officers and pilots, he expressed satisfaction over their high aerobatics. He underscored the need for all airmen to intensify the flight drill so that they can be ready to successfully perform their combat duty even under any unfavorable conditions.
					
					 He instructed all commanding officers and pilots of fighters of the air force to steadily improve the quality of their drills in the future, too, on the basis of the successes and experience gained in the current contest and put their rehearsals on a normal track and make part of their life by conducting exercises the way the anti-Japanese guerrillas did in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 He stressed that once an order of final attack is issued, they should promptly take off and mercilessly blow up the strongholds of aggression and pave a broad avenue to the units of the People's Army advancing southward.
					
					 A prize-awarding ceremony took place.
					
					 He met the commanding officers and pilots of fighters who came first in the contest and gave a pep talk to them.
					
					 Then he had a photo session with them.
					
					 Among the spectators were Ri Su Yong, Ri Man Gon, O Su Yong, Kim Yong Chol, Ri Il Hwan and Ri Yong Rae and Ri Pyong Chol, senior officials of the Central Committee of the WPK, and service personnel of the KPA.

articles.title: European Countries Denounced for Calling for "Int'l Commitment" as Regards Anti-DPRK "Sanctions Resolution"
articles.content:
European Countries Denounced for Calling for "Int'l Commitment" as Regards Anti-DPRK "Sanctions Resolution"
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Sunday gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA in connection with the fact that European countries are calling for "international commitment" as regards the anti-DPRK "sanctions resolution" adopted at the UN Security Council:
					 After the U.S. prodded the UNSC into cooking up another anti-DPRK "sanctions resolution" recently, UK, France and other European countries demanded the DPRK "fulfill its international commitment."
					
					 The UNSC in the "sanctions resolution" branded the nuclear warhead explosion test conducted by the DPRK in September last as "threat to international peace and security", but the UN Charter and all international laws do not stipulate that a nuclear test poses any threat to international peace and security.
					
					 If there is such article, the U.S. and other permanent members of the UNSC should be subject to the sanctions, to begin with, as they carried out nuclear tests more than any other countries. 
					
					 The DPRK has categorically rejected "sanctions resolution" of the UNSC as it denies the sovereignty of the DPRK only.
					
					 In this regard, the DPRK in May last demanded the UN secretary general clarify such legal holes in the above-said "sanctions resolution." But the UN Secretariat has not replied yet though six months have passed since then.
					
					 Under this situation it is the stand of the DPRK that the European countries which boast their history and tradition of law-abiding should answer the above-said question.
					
					 Their act of demanding the DPRK "fulfill international commitment," failing to give any answer to this question, can convince nobody. 
					
					 Nothing is more dastardly and mean action than trying to slap independent sanctions against the DPRK outside the UNSC as the "resolution" of the UNSC this time, in particular, is a product which reflected the balance of forces within it.
					
					 If European countries have independence, they should think and behave according to it.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group's Bid for "Independent Sanctions" under Fire
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group's Bid for "Independent Sanctions" under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Reconciliation Council Sunday made public a statement denouncing the Park Geun Hye group of criminals making desperate efforts, frightened by the nuclear warhead explosion test of the DPRK.
					 Most disgusting is that the Park group is crying out for "independent sanctions" recklessly following its U.S. master which cooked up the illegal anti-DPRK "sanctions resolution", the statement said, and went on:
					
					 No sooner had the "sanctions resolution" been adopted at the UN than the Park group called a press conference at midnight at which it cried out for "welcome" and "landmark measure". It announced "independent sanctions proposal", claiming that it would take the lead in implementing "sanctions resolution".
					
					 They contained impossible contents in the "independent sanctions proposal" by daring additionally include supreme leadership organs and core officials of the party and state of the DPRK in the list of sanctions.
					
					 The "independent sanctions" announced by the Park group are nothing but a pipedream.
					
					 It is necessary for the Park group to recollect that the DPRK had already declared that it can live as well as it wishes without south Korea but will see south Korea live by turning its back on the DPRK.
					
					 The Park group's persistent moves for escalating confrontation with the compatriots will further precipitate its shameful ruin only.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and her group should properly understand that their sanctions which are no more than malicious fuss and foolish racket will precipitate their miserable end.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK Ministry of Public Health Returns Home
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK Ministry of Public Health Returns Home
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Public Health led by Minister Kang Ha Guk returned home on Sunday after attending an international meeting for worldwide public health innovation held in Doha of Qatar.

articles.title: Participants in 8th UAWK Congress Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Participants in 8th UAWK Congress Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 At the hall where statues of leaders stand they paid tribute to the great leaders who founded the UAWK and wisely led it.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their life.

articles.title: Participants in 8th UAWK Congress Enjoy Documentary
articles.content:
Participants in 8th UAWK Congress Enjoy Documentary
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) watched a documentary film "Ushering in Golden Age of Revolution" at the People's Palace of Culture on Sunday.
					 The film deals with the undying feats of supreme leader Kim Jong Un who inspired service the whole party, the entire army and all the people to the drive for building a powerful socialist nation and displayed the dignity and strength of Juche Korea on the highest level with his energetic guidance.

articles.title: KCNA Founding Anniversary Marked
articles.content:
KCNA Founding Anniversary Marked
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency marks its 70th birthday.
					 The KCNA is the only official mouthpiece for the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government which came into being and has developed under the care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and, it is a powerful media organ standing on the forefront of the party ideological work for realizing the cause of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the KCNA on Dec. 5, Juche 35 (1946) and indicated the theoretical and practical issues arising in building a news agency of new Korea. And he came to the agency several times and wisely led it to fulfill its mission and role as a mouthpiece representing and helping the Party and the government and a center for news service.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il put forward the KCNA in the van of effecting a drastic turn in media activities promoting the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and showed deep political trust and paternal love for the employees of the agency, calling them as the disseminators of the great Juche idea and soldiers on an outpost of the Party's ideological front. And he energetically led the agency to preserve its revolutionary character as the news agency of the leader and the party and bring about a new turn in disseminating the greatness of the party and the leader and conducting media warfare against the enemy.
					
					 Over the past 70 years after its birth, the KCNA has recorded a history of loyalty under the wise leadership and deep care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and made great contributions to the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche by carrying through the Party's idea and policy of Juche-oriented news service.
					
					 A meeting was held Sunday to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the KCNA.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, officials, journalists, editors and persons of merit in the field of media, and a delegation of the Korean News Service of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan. 
					
					 Read out at the meeting was a congratulatory message the WPK Central Committee sent to the journalists, translators and other employees and officials of the KCNA.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Foreign Minister's Humiliating Solicitation Diplomacy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Foreign Minister's Humiliating Solicitation Diplomacy
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet Foreign Minister Yun Pyong Se at the recent talks with the foreign minister of Australia groundlessly pulled up the DPRK, raising a hue and cry over the "north's direct threat" and "human rights issue." He begged for "close cooperation in the campaign against the north".
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary terms Yun's behavior the most treacherous act to do harm to the compatriots in the north in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The attempt to isolate and stifle the compatriots by depending on outside forces is, in fact, no more than the last-ditch efforts of the doomed. 
					
					 The south Korean people branded Yun as an eunuch of Park Geun Hye, modern day Ri Wan Yong and the guy to be buried together with the witch of Chongwadae before anyone else as he has committed indelible crimes before the nation while pursuing sycophancy and acts of treachery from the very day he took his office. 
					
					 He should bear in mind that his desperate efforts to boost cooperation in the campaign to stifle the DPRK with outside forces while protecting the witch of Chongwadae more dead than alive would only precipitate his miserable destruction.
					
					 The puppet group of the traitors obsessed with sycophancy and treachery and the confrontation with the compatriots in the north are bound to face a stern judgment by the nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Park Geun Hye's Gimmick-based Last-ditch Efforts
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Park Geun Hye's Gimmick-based Last-ditch Efforts
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea made her third "talk to the people". As was the case with the previous talks, the traitor asserted, far from admitting her crimes, that she would leave the issue of her retirement including the reduction of her office term to the "National Assembly" and that if the ruling and opposition parties provide a "proposal" for her resignation, she would step down from the "presidential" office under the set schedule and legal procedure.
					 Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary says that the traitor's cunning wordplay is just the height of shamelessness stunning the world.
					
					 She resorts to the gimmick to gratify her dirty greed for power, being unaware of the heinous crimes she committed and the demand of the angry people holding candlelight in their hands, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Her political scandal with Choe Sun Sil, a bete noire, is a hideous crime unprecedented in the world that can be made up with nothing and can never be pardoned.
					
					 The Park's talk was pursuant to her sinister scheme to turn back the situation by putting off the time at any cost. It is a revelation of her impudent and crafty gimmick to pass the ball over to the NA and lead the ruling and opposition parties to a quarrel aimed to realize the conservative force's ambition to stay in power. 
					
					 Park's last-ditch efforts will only touch off the towering anger of the people.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Call for Dismantling Financial Groups
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Call for Dismantling Financial Groups
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- Shipbuilding workers held a press conference before the building of the "National Federation of Businessmen" on Friday and called for dismantling financial groups which supported the puppet authorities in the scandal by providing them with illicit money, according to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye.
					 Speakers said that Samsung, Hyundai, SK, LG and other groups called for the retrogressive revision of the labor law in return for donating black money to Mir and K Sports Foundations.

articles.title: 6th All-People Action against Park Regime Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
6th All-People Action against Park Regime Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- The 6th all-people action against the Park Geun Hye Regime was staged in south Korea on Dec. 3 under the sponsorship of the People's Emergency Action for Bringing Down the Park Geun Hye Regime, according to south Korean media such as KBS, CBS and MBC.
					 In Seoul, 20 000 people held a rally in front of the "Saenuri Party" building to protest against the regime and advance meetings for an all-people action took place in different parts.
					
					 Such rallies urging Park Geun Hye's resignation were held all at once in all other parts of south Korea including Pusan, Taegu and Kwangju. 
					
					 The People's Emergency Action announced that candlelight rallies were staged across south Korea with 2.12 million people involved and 1.7 million in Seoul.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Denounced for Gagging Media
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Denounced for Gagging Media
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye is making desperate efforts to gag media in a bid to prevent them from reporting about the truth behind her extra-large scandal.
					 She called the chairman of Choongang Ilbo to Chongwadae and instructed him to pressurize the manager of JTBC operated by the newspaper to quit, insisting that Choe Sun Sil is to blame for the scandal and the president did nothing wrong.
					
					 However, the manager did not yield to her pressure.
					
					 Under that situation Chongwadae pressed Ri Jae Yong, vice-chairman of Samsung Electronics, into realizing her attempt.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Parties Demand Park Geun Hye Leave Office
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Parties Demand Park Geun Hye Leave Office
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- South Korean opposition parties sniped at traitor Park Geun Hye for using tactics aimed at prolonging her remaining days while going against the public sentiment, according to reports in Seoul on Saturday.
					 The floor leader of the Minju Party, in a commentary, demanded that the "president" leave office immediately, saying that the people's candlelight actions had already impeached Park politically.
					
					 A spokesperson for the Kukmin Party underscored the need for "National Assembly" to pass the bill to impeach Park.
					
					 An ex-representative of the said party told a news conference that the "Saenuri Party" has no qualifications for setting the plan for Park's resignation.
					
					 On the same day, the representative of the Minju Party, the chairperson of the emergency measure committee of the Kukmin Party and other members of the leadership and lawmakers of opposition parties joined the 6th all-people action rallies launched widely across south Korea including Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul, Kwangju and Taegu.

articles.title: S. Korean Foreign Minister's Anti-DPRK Racket Ridiculed
articles.content:
S. Korean Foreign Minister's Anti-DPRK Racket Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs of south Korea, kicked up a racket for confrontation with the DPRK to save the fate of the Park Geun Hye regime on the wane, sparking off censure from inside and outside, according to south Korea's Yonhap News.
					 The guy took an active part in the publication of a joint statement faulting the DPRK at an international meeting in Australia on Nov. 25.
					
					 On the sidelines of the meeting he met the person in the diplomatic authority of this country and solicited for cooperation for stifling the DPRK while talking about "provocation" and "threat". He even talked rubbish about "human rights" in the DPRK.
					
					 He openly disclosed an attempt to stifle his fellow countrymen in the north, saying that the new administration of the U.S. "would tackle the nuclear issue of the north as a priority".
					
					 This is not all about the solicitation junket made by the senseless guy steeped in confrontation with the fellow countrymen while working as a "waiting boy" under the armpit of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 At other international meetings like a session of the UN Human Rights Council in Geneva and a ministerial meeting of the ASEAN regional forum this year, he staged the farce of eliciting support for pressure on the DPRK, arousing derision from among the world people.

articles.title: Koreans in China Flails Park Geun Hye's 3rd "Talk to People"
articles.content:
Koreans in China Flails Park Geun Hye's 3rd "Talk to People"
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- Choe Se Jin, secretary of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China, issued an article on December 2 in denunciation of the third "talk to people" made by Park Geun Hye of south Korea.
					 The article branded her talk as a tactic to lead a discussion for her impeachment at the "National Assembly" to contradiction between the ruling and opposition parties and thus gain even a little time.
					
					 He stressed that Koreans in China positively supported the south Korean people who turned out in staging an over-night sit-in for forcing Park to resign.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Germany
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Concluding Speech at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in booklet by the Azzawi Media Print in Berlin.
					 The work, published on March 31, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the validity of the new strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea, and the  intention of the Party which laid down the line.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony was held at the publishing house on Nov. 28.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Mongolia on Nov. 30.
					 J. Lomvo, chairman of the Mongolian Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits such as a remembrance meeting and film show on the 5th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige competencia de pilotaje de combate
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige competencia de pilotaje de combate
Pyongyang, 4 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio la competencia de pilotaje de combate de los miembros de mando de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC-2016.
					A las nueve de la manana Kim Jong Un aparecio en el aeropuerto junto con su esposa Ri Sol Ju.
					
					El Comandante Supremo recibio ramos de flores de los aviadores.
					
					El comandante de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC pronuncio el discurso de apertura.
					
					Kim Jong Un dio orden de salida a los miembros de mando y aviadores, alineados frente al puesto de vigilancia de tribuna.
					
					La competencia se realizo dividida en dos grupos: el de avion de caza y el de avion ligero.
					
					Los aviones de cada regimiento se despegaron en par, se acercaron a la zona de blanco, hicieron el bombardeo y disparo con diferentes armas a la meta circular y se aterrizaron.
					
					El orden fue decidido por grupos y unidades al sumar los puntos evaluados por conducto de diversos aparatos de vigilancia.
					
					Los miembros de mando de aviacion y los pilotos de combate dieron golpes certeros al blanco.
					
					Kim Jong Un se mostro satisfecho evaluando el arte de navegacion y destaco la necesidad de intensificar el entrenamiento de aviacion para que los aviadores cumplan satisfactoriamente con sus misiones de combate aun en medio de cualesquier condiciones desfavorables.
					
					El Comandante Supremo ordeno a todos los miembros de mando de aviacion y los pilotos de combate de las fuerzas mejorar la calidad de los ejercicios a base de los exitos y experiencias adquiridos en esta competencia, y normalizar, habituarse y acostumbrarse a la aviacion.
					
					Enfatizo que si se les de la orden de ataque final, deben aniquilar sin piedad los bastiones enemigos y abrir el camino ancho a las unidades del EPC que avanzaran al sur.
					
					Al final de la competencia hubo la premiacion.
					
					Kim Jong Un se reunio con los participantes que ocuparon el primer lugar en la competencia y les estimularon calidamente, asi como se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					La vieron los cuadros directivos del Comite Central del PTC: Ri Su Yong, Ri Man Gon, O Su Yong, Kim Yong Chol, Ri Il Hwan, Ri Yong Rae y Ri Pyong Chol, asi como los oficiales y soldados del EPC.

articles.title: Vocero de MINREX de Corea denuncia la exigencia injusta de paises europeos
articles.content:
Vocero de MINREX de Corea denuncia la exigencia injusta de paises europeos
Pyongyang, 4 de diciembre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada el dia 4 en relacion con que los paises europeos hablan tanto del "cumplimiento del deber internacional" bajo el pretexto de la "resolucion de sanciones" anti-RPDC aprobada en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio la siguiente respuesta:
					Se dicen que despues de ser inventada la "resolucion de sanciones" anti-RPDC del CS de la ONU bajo la instigacion de los Estados Unidos, unos paises europeos como Gran Bretana y Francias exigen a la RPDC a "observar el deber internacional".
					
					En la "resolucion" arriba mencionada, el CS de la ONU cuestiono como la "amenaza a la paz y la seguridad internacionales" la prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear de la RPDC efectuada en septiembre pasado. Pero, no existe ningun articulo que califica la prueba nuclear de una amenaza a la paz y la seguridad internacionales ni en Carta de la ONU ni en otros codigos internacionales.
					
					Si existe ese articulo, los paises que deben ser objeto de sancion seran EE.UU. y otros paises permanentes del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que realizaron mas que otros las pruebas nucleares.
					
					La RPDC rechaza totalmente la "resolucion de sancion" del CS de la ONU porque este organo internacional niega solamente la soberania de la RPDC que tienen todos los paises soberanos.
					
					Al respecto, la RPDC demando en mayo pasado al secretario general de la ONU explicar tal contradiccion juridica de la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC. Pero el Secretariado de la ONU no da ninguna explicacion hasta la fecha.
					
					En esta condicion, tienen que dar respuesta a esa pregunta los paises europeos que se jactan de la historia y tradicion constitucionales, lo que es nuestra posicion.
					
					Si demandan a la RPDC el " cumplimiento del deber internacional" sin dar ninguna respuesta en cuestion, lo cual no tiene ninguna persuasiva.
					
					En particular, la presente "resolucion" es el producto que refleja las correlaciones entre las fuerzas del Consejo, de ahi que seria una bajeza la ejecucion de la sancion independiente fuera del CS de la ONU.
					
					Si tienen la independencia, los paises europeos deben meditar y portarse independientemente.

articles.title: CRN denuncia a Park Geun-hye que habla de la "sancion independiente"
articles.content:
CRN denuncia a Park Geun-hye que habla de la "sancion independiente"
Pyongyang, 4 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En su declaracion publicada este domingo, el vocero del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional se refirio a los esfuerzos desesperados de los compinches criminales tan pasmados ante la prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear de la RPDC, y prosiguio:
					Lo mas abominable es la imprudencia de la camarilla de Park Geun-hye que habla tanto de la "sancion independiente" adhiriendose sin ton ni son a las tentativas de su amo yanqui que fabrico la ilegal "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC.
					
					Tan pronto como se aprobara la "resolucion de sancion" en la ONU, los titeres concedieron a medianoche una entrevista de prensa y vociferaron la "bienvenida" y la "medida de poste". Y seguidamente escenificaron una farsa de publicar el "proyecto de sancion independiente" insistiendo en ponerse en la delantera de la ejecucion de "resolucion de sancion".
					
					Los titeres registraron en ese "proyecto" los contenidos imposibles con su posicion y capacidad incluyendo que se atrevieron a adicionar en la lista de sancion los supremos organos directivos y los funcionarios medulares de nuestro partido y el Estado.
					
					La horda de Park necesita recordar el hecho de que la RPDC declaro dignamente que para su existencia no necesita jamas el Sur de Corea y que observara como mantendria este su existencia dando la espalda a aquella.
					
					Cuanto mas los titeres se entregan freneticamente a la confrontacion fratricida, tanto mas se acelerara su arruinamiento vergonzoso.
					
					Park y sus compinches deben saber correctamente que tal payasada deviene el acto de suicidio que adelanta solo su fin miserable.

articles.title: Equipo coreano se corona campeon en la Copa Mundial (F) sub-20 de 2016
articles.content:
Equipo coreano se corona campeon en la Copa Mundial (F) sub-20 de 2016
Pyongyang, 4 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La seleccion de la RPDC levanto el trofeo al lograr victorias consecutivas en la Copa Mundial (f) sub-20 de la FIFA de 2016.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 3 el partido final entre la RPDC y Francia.
					
					En este juego, el once coreano doblego a su rival por 3:1.
